text.p: Polish glass maker Huta Szkla Gospodarczego Irena SA plans no dividend for 1996 and wants to earmark most of last year's 6.5-million-zloty net for reserve capital, the firm said on Friday.
It said in a statement that the firm's general shareholders meeting would vote on setting aside 6.47 million zlotys from the 1996 net for reserve capital and the rest for various bonuses.
